modName: R18Pn 01 - Eisen Platte Armor for UNP CBBEv3 ReColor-STEEL
summary: A steel recolor for NPR\'s UNP/CBBE version of Eisen Platte Armor. Replaces white armor.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][size=4][b]About:[/b][/size][/color]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=3]FILE TYPE IS REPLACER, sorry for confusion.[/size]

As a request I\'ve brought over my steel recolor to the UNP/CBBE version from NPR. I added the armor as well which includes the texturing. These will give you only my textured version and not the black armor.

Heavy Armor - Craftable (Iron) - Upgradeable

Added a Light Armor BSA file to make this armor light, it\'s also rebalanced to light standards.


[color=green][size=4][b]Other Downloads:[/b][/size][/color]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11050]Original armor (black & white) br NPR/Kurese[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15419]Nice Gold/Black/Red armor by Messias Mummo[/url]

[color=blue][size=4][b]Thanks:[/b][/size][/color]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Thanks goes out to NPR & KURESE once again. Top quality work like always!

[color=yellow][size=4][b]My Armor Recolors:[/b][/size][/color]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14055]Ritter Armor for UNP and CBBE V3 ReColor-STEEL[/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15243]Maxwell Outfit UNP ReColor-Brown[/url]
author: NPR - CluelessClue
